DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Menopause last menstrual period , natural phenomenon woman . Postmenopausal , woman may experience unpleasant symptom hot flush , urogenital pain , headache pain musculoskeletal system . That happen due decrease ovarian hormone secretion change autonomic system . Pain also cause complex autonomic activity . For pain management , therapeutic electrical stimulation peripheral nervous system promote modulation nociceptive incentive release endogenous opioids . According reviewed study , use transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) , directly stimulate central nervous system , present result manipulation autonomic system , observed change heart rate cognitive improvement dementia . Given possibility , present study aim investigate whether use Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation low frequency generate autonomic psychophysical change healthy postmenopausal woman . Objective : To evaluate effectiveness Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation autonomic psychophysical parameter postmenopausal woman . Methods : randomize , crossover , double-blind . A sample thirty patient select accord inclusion exclusion criterion previously establish . The autonomic psychophysical function evaluate Quantitative Sensory Testing Conditioned Pain Modulation ( pain threshold heat modulation condition pain , respectively ) , well scale evaluate catastrophism sleep quality ( scale Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index ) . After application scale , participant subject active Ttranscutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation session sham fortnight washout randomization . All research subject invite participate study sign Informed Consent Informed ( ICI ) . This study register Clinical Trials .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: To period postmenopause ; Do chronic diseases comorbidities drug treatment ; Accept participate study sign free inform consent form . Start continuous medication study period ; Display cognitive problem make difficult understand questionnaire proposal ; History alcohol drug abuse last 6 month ; History neurological disorder ; History cardiac arrhythmia ; History moderate severe head injury ; History neurosurgery ; Uncompensated systemic disease , chronic inflammatory disease ( diabetes , lupus , rheumatoid arthritis , Sjogren 's syndrome , Reiter 's syndrome ) ; History uncompensated hypothyroidism ; History personal cancer , past treatment .
